sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOMMEE, a town of Hindustan, in the province of Guj rat. It is a large place, but has a wretched appearance, and the wall by which it is surrounded is in many parts falling to pieces. It stands in a swamp, and is surrounded by numerous puddles, and in the rainy season is almost under water. It is situated to the southeast of RahdunpÏ…pr.
